main.name: Joshua Cassidy
main.description: Currently studying a BSc (Honours) in Computing at the National College of Ireland.
main.bio: My name is Joshua Cassidy and I am currently in first year at the National College of Ireland attending the BSc (Honours) in Computing course. I have started programming initially when I was 16, in java, where I learned for two years before branching out into other technolgies such as Python3, JavaScript, React JS, C#, Ruby, Java, HTML, CSS, WordPress, BootStrap,Git,Node, Mongo Database, Redux and JSON.
main.contact: If you have any questions or would just like to chat feel free to contact me.

education.description: In May 2015, I graduate from Mount Temple Comprehensive School where I completed my Leaving Certificate.

In September 2016 I started Bachelor's degree in Computing. The modules which I have currently undertaken are: Web Design, Introduction to Programming, Introduction to Maths for Business and Computing, Problem Solving and Programming Concepts, Software Applications for Business, The Computing Industry, Operating Systems, Computer Architechture, Digital Multimedia and Managing Your Learning.

work.title: Web Application Intern
work.description: My position in Webbiz entails to developing a Dynamic Financial Planning Application that has a seemless user experience with the design team, that is to be used by marketing campaign in order for the sales team to get qualified lead, this application is being developed using React JS for the front end, Node JS for the backend and Firebase for the data of the application.

work.title: Bar Support Staff
work.description: My role as part of the bar support team was to maintain the Whisky Bar, Dancefloor, Bin Room, Mezzanine and outside Smoking area. Some of the responsibities I had were as follows: Collecting Glasses, Changing Bins, Tidying the Bin Rooms, Cleaning up Spillages, Answering and Recieving Radio Calls.

work.title: Volunteer
work.description: My responsibities as a Volunteer in Oxfam include: Trouble Shooting and Solivng issues with the Cash Register System, Operating the Cash Register System, Managing the Shop Phone and Serving Customers on the Till.
